name: Chickenfight
description:
This game is local multiplier and requires at least any 2 of the supported input devices. Supported input devices include:

  • Keyboard : Press any button to join
  • Controller : Press any button to join

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Controls:

  • Thrust:
  1.  Keyboard: W or (Up Arrow)
  2. Controller: Right Trigger
  • Turn:
  1.  Keyboard: AD or (Left Arrow)(Right Arrow)
  2. Controller: D-Pad (Left, Right) or Left Analogue Stick (Left, Right)
  • Parry:

While in parry state, you can deflect bullets!

  1. Keyboard: Spacebar
  2. Controller: Button South (A on Xbox Controller, X on PlayStation Controller)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Chickenfight is a Dogfight but you have to run instead. The goal of the game is to be the last one standing.

You play as an airplane which is out of ammo but the other players share the same role. The only thing you all have is a shield mechanism (parry) which deflects bullets. Get the enemy eliminated at all costs and be the last one standing.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

This game was originally made for the 'FridayNightGameJam#2022-13' but since this game took more time to develop (3 hours 32 minutes) than the  jam rules specified (3 hours), this game couldn't be submitted for the game jam.

Theme:  'Make a game using the provided art part in 3 hours (Art Pack: https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-shmup). Feel free to use the bonus theme (Bonus Theme: Explosions) to help you come up with an idea, but it is not mandatory to follow it.'
